## Shiny Apps

Interactive applications built with R Shiny, running entirely in your browser via WebR (shinylive).

::: {.grid}

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}
::: {.card}
### Sliders Demo

A demonstration of various slider input types in Shiny, including integers, decimals, ranges, and animated sliders.

[Launch App](apps/sliders/index.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}
::: {.card}
### Mean & SD Explorer

Enter a target mean and standard deviation to see what 5 or 10 data points with those properties might look like. Great for building intuition about variability.

[Launch App](apps/mean-sd/index.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::
:::

::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 .g-col-lg-4}
::: {.card}
### Data Explorer

Explore an embedded dataset with interactive plots and summary statistics. View data tables, scatter plots, box plots, and grouped summaries.

[Launch App](apps/data-explorer/index.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::
:::

:::
